price: او هغوى ته د سپېڅلې خبرې لارښوونه شوې وه او د ستايل شوي (الله) لارې ته ور سم كړى شوي وو.
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
